title: XDM Business Opportunity Person Relation
description: This class is used to capture XDM Business Opportunity Person Relationship attributes.

xdm:opportunityPersonID.title: Opportunity Person ID
xdm:opportunityPersonID.description: Unique ID for the relationship between the opportunity and the person.

xdm:opportunityID.title: Opportunity ID
xdm:opportunityID.description: Unique ID for the opportunity in this opportunity person relationship.

xdm:personID.title: Person ID
xdm:personID.description: Unique ID for the person in this opportunity person relationship.

xdm:personRole.title: Person Role
xdm:personRole.description: Role of the person on this opportunity.

xdm:isPrimary.title: Primary Flag
xdm:isPrimary.description: Boolean indicating if the person is the primary contact on this opportunity.
